segments.text: Hi , Maggy , Did you hear about David ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About David , No , I didn ’ t hear anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , about David and new boss .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I don ’ t quite follow you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I hear David have been fired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that is a shame . He is really hard working .
segments.speaker: S2
